short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hamster Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Hamster background. Cute Hamster wallpaper theme for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Hamster wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Option to randomize or favorite Hamster backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Easy access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel for adding websites for fast access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Quick navigation to more theme options.
12. Simplified sharing to social media platforms.
13. One-click access to download wallpapers.
14. Fast access to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Hamster new tab.
